1.name: MicroPlace Inc.
1.description:
Built on Ruby on Rails, MicroPlace website is one ofmy favorite projects I have worked on. Being part of an Agile Team,love coding in RoR and also crafting UI from Mockups aka Photoshop.

MicroPlace's mission is to help alleviate global poverty by enabling everyday people to make investments in the world's working poor.

www.microplace.com

2.name: DoCause
2.description:
DoCause is an award winning business concept that serves individual supporters, non-profit organizations and socially responsible corporations.

Involved in complete designing of User Interface of the website including XHTMLization.

www.docause.org (TBL)
